name: NaaC
description:
NaaC is a fast single-screen shooter in which you can kill thousand of smelling aliens. Play as a space marine, kidnapped from the Earth, packed with only a jetpack and a pistol, and defeat a horde of monster! 

    5 different types of alien
    Arena mode and Survive mode (beat Arena to unlock Survive)
    boss and mini-bosses
    comfortable mouse+keyboard control system
    a lot of blood on the floor... 

    100% original and high-res graphics
    7 different weapons
    extended combo system
